articles.description: Nearly 100 journalists from around the world were given access to a Zoom press conference that was also broadcast live on YouTube, with many ready to ask Fury about his long association with Daniel Kinahan. In a week when Kinahan has been described by the aut…
articles.content:
If Tyson Fury was expecting a difficult encounter with the media on Thursday, it proved about as taxing as climbing into the ring with a random punter from the Wembley crowd.
Nearly 100 journalists … [+527 chars]

articles.author: Aden-Jay Wood
articles.title: Jim Davidson slammed for women's football joke: 'That isn't very funny' - GB News
articles.description: The comedian made the comment during a debate on whether Northern Ireland boss Kenny Shiels was right to be criticised for saying ‘women are more emotional than men’
articles.content:
Jim Davidson has been slammed for saying hes looking forward to watching women footballers lift their tops up in celebration.
